snitch.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to tell someone in authority about something that another person has done wrong, because you want to cause trouble for that person
snitch.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to quickly steal something unimportant or of little value
snitch.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who is not liked because they tell people in authority when other people do things that are wrong or against the rules
snitch.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He didnâ€™t want to be a snitch, and besides, Kevin was his friend.
